sip_features.sip_feature:
HTML

RTL Updates:

HSDs:
1. 1204977792 , "Gen2.1: Implementation of Router performance improvements - frequency & crossbar - for server usage ": Implemented the cross bar arbiter in the SB routers. This feature is enabled by setting the dynamo parameter "XbarArb 1" in the routers params. Setting this bit, would replace the legacy arbiter with the new crossbar arbiters. The feature is currently in a beta quality, to be used only by the 10nm server customer, and has a limitation on multicast completion aggregation (currently not supported).Feature is sabled by default.
2. 1404394075 , "Migrate to questaCDC V10.4a for SIPs delivering to CNL CPU after 2015ww30 ": Updated Questa CDC version to be compliant with version V10.4a
3. 1304117991, "SB Dynamo does not support more than 10 multicast groups ": Increased the upper limit for the total number of multicast groups in a fabric. This is a dynamo releated change.
4. 1404323660, "IOSF-SB Fabric Compiler (Dynamo) : IOSF-SB SBR MI Support Fails When Router in MI_GROUP has async ports ": Fixed xml2csv file in our scripts to pick up the correct clock for a dangling router2router port when a router in MI groups is async.
5. 1404367554, "SBR Repeater corekit doesn't link PAYLOAD RTL parameter to interface parameter": Linked the PAYLOAD_WDITH paramter to interface parameter in the corekit for SBR Repeater. It would affect only customers using the repeater corekit and is transparent otherwise.
6. 1404351918, "FWD (PCR) Migrate IPs to CDCLint from Onda ": Enabled CDCLint for ACECDC runs.

Backend Updates:

General Updates:

Validation Updates:

General Updates:

sip_speccons.sip_speccon:
HTML

Integration Notes:

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable CTECH library when synthesising the IP.

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable/behavior CTECH library when simulating the IP.

sip_specins.sip_specin:
HTML

This SBR release uses the "IOSF_SVC_2015WW37" version of SVC in IRR

For support file an HSD at https://hsdes.intel.com/home/default.html#magazine?id=101846185&contentId=1012194360

The first endpoint release with support for parity pins is IOSF_Sideband_Endpoint_ALL_2014WW31_R1p0_v5.

The Zircon scores are uploaded to the IPDS dashboard for the SBR IP at https://zircon.fm.intel.com/zircon/zircon/zirconReleaseDashboardTable.php?top_filter_checkbox=0&Proj_id=12686&IP_id=17319&milestone_filter=4&Ver_id=all&App_id=all&showlatest=0
